Title: The Lost and the Plunderers
Writer: Frank Darabont (developed by), Robert Kirkman (based on the series of graphic novels by), Tony Moore (based on the series of graphic novels by), Charlie Adlard (based on the series of graphic novels by), Angela Kang, Channing Powell, Corey Reed
Actors: Andrew Lincoln, Norman Reedus, Lauren Cohan, Danai Gurira
Plot: Groups unite their forces and converge on the Hilltop; Aaron and Enid search for allies; Simon takes matters into his own hands.
